"}, {"content": "The victims of the pipe bomb explosion at the Ariana Grande concert in Manchester, England, on May 22, 2017, were mostly young people. The victims included 22-year-old Iranian-born British man Ali Alamdani, who was attending the concert with his friend, 24-year-old Iranian-born British man Ali Akbarzadeh. Both were injured in the explosion.

The victims were taken to Manchester Royal Infirmary for treatment. Alamdani was treated for minor injuries, while Akbarzadeh was treated for a serious injury. He later died from his injuries.
